biography:
In 2004, Kiran was back in New Zealand filming Le monde de Narnia: chapitre 1 - Le lion, la sorcière blanche et l'armoire magique (2005) playing a character called Ginarrbrik.

He also writes poetry; his work has been published in Britain and America.

Kiran is a "Guinness World Record" holder as the "shortest professional stuntman currently working in film" since October 2003.

- IMDb Mini Biography
name: Kiran Shah
